location.blockedMessage: Location access has been blocked. Some features like automatic currency selection may not work properly.
location.prompt: Please enable location services in your browser settings

legal.disclaimer: This page provides general information and is not a substitute for professional legal advice.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have questions about these terms or our privacy practices, contact us at {{email}}.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how {{storeName}} collects, uses, discloses and safeguards your information when you use our services.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.body: We collect information you provide (name, email, shipping details) and limited technical data (browser, locale, approximate location) to operate and improve our service.

google.title: 3. Google Authentication
google.body: When you sign in with Google we receive your name, email and profile image (if provided). We do not receive your password. You can revoke access in your Google account.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.body: We use minimal cookies/local storage for session, preference and security purposes. Disabling them may affect functionality.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.body: We do not sell personal data. We share necessary information only with processors (payments, shipping, infrastructure) required to operate the Service.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.body: We retain data as long as needed for the purposes described or as required by law. You can request deletion subject to legal obligations.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.body: Our Service is not directed to children under 13 and we do not knowingly collect data from them.

security.title: 8. Security
security.body: We apply reasonable safeguards; however no method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights
rights.body: Depending on your jurisdiction you may request access, correction or deletion of your data.

transfers.title: 10. International Transfers
transfers.body: Data may be processed in other countries with appropriate safeguards.

thirdParty.title: 11. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.body: We may link to external services; their practices are governed by their own policies.

updates.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
updates.body: We may update this policy; continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service (the 'Terms') govern your use of the {{storeName}} website and services.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement
agreement.body: By accessing or using the Service you accept these Terms.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.body: You must be at least 13 years old or the legal age in your jurisdiction.

accounts.title: 3. Accounts
accounts.body: You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and activities.

orders.title: 4. Orders
orders.body: All orders are subject to acceptance. We may refuse or cancel for suspected fraud or errors.

payments.title: 5. Payments
payments.body: You agree to provide valid payment information and authorize charges for placed orders.

shipping.title: 6. Shipping
shipping.body: Delivery estimates are not guaranteed. Risk passes on delivery.

returns.title: 7. Returns & Refunds
returns.body: Returns are governed by our posted return policy; some items may be final sale.

prohibited.title: 8. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.body: You may not misuse the Service, attempt unauthorized access or engage in illegal activity.

ip.title: 9. Intellectual Property
ip.body: All content is owned by us or licensors and protected by law.

disclaimers.title: 10. Disclaimers
disclaimers.body: The Service is provided 'as is' without warranties except as required by law.

liability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
liability.body: To the fullest extent permitted we are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

indemnity.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnity.body: You agree to indemnify us for claims arising from your misuse of the Service.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.body: We may modify these Terms; material changes will be posted with a new date.

governing.title: 14. Governing Law
governing.body: Applicable law is the jurisdiction where we are established unless otherwise required.

contact.title: 15. Contact
contact.body: Questions about these Terms? Contact us.

register.heading: Create your account
register.name: Full Name
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long

legalStats.title: Legal Page Views
legalStats.subtitle: Aggregated, non-identifiable counts for Privacy Policy & Terms pages.
legalStats.footerNote: Counts derived from hashed IP + User-Agent (no PII).
